yaluwekge pothak nikam labila kiyewwa.1) hamoma eka wage rajya sampath awabhawitha karala thiyenawa.kohoma wunath me pothe thiyena eka sadhaniya lakshanayak thamayi kathuwaraya thamange ee samahara waradi gana nawatha dakwana kanagatudayaka aakalpaya.2)ekangayi.kathawak widiyatath warthawak widiyatath dewidiyatama potha thiyenawa.sodu path balimakin thorawa potha mudranaya kara athi bawa penawa.3)hamuda winaya gana sahena prashna thiyena bawak penunath ee sandaha gaththu kriyamarga gana kisidu sandahanak natha.4)aththata malti baral walin labena wedi balaya agaya karala thibbath ee aayudha genwima gana kisidu satahanak naha.(ee gana noliwwe chandrikata lakunak dekak yayi kiyala hithalada danne naha) walioya satana gana podi wistharayak sarasale satana gana podi wistharayak thiyenne.samahara wita kathuwaraya ee yuddha gana etharam danuwath wimak nathuwa inna athi.5)samayata adala deshapalana thindu gana dadi wiwechanayak kathuwaraya dakwa thibunath mahinda balayata pamina pasuth wasara kihipayak yanathuru "satan wirama giwisuma"namikawa ho kriyathmaka wima kathuwaraya monama widiyakinwath prashna karanne natha.6)pilikul sahagatha prakashayak.7)fonsekata sinha rejimenthuwa,kamalta wijayaba rejimenthuwa 53 senanankaya wage.nawika hamudawa ekka thibbayi kiyana gatumath pudumayi.8)ekanga wenna amaruyi.samaharawita fonsekata pahara dime adahasin liwwa deyakadi wunath fonsekata lakunu labimak thamayi wela thiyenne.(fonseka me potha gana kagahuwe kage hari lanuwak nisa wenna athi.)
rawutin/swichin yana dekama drudanga matha padanam wi athi nisa 4 wana ha 3 wana sthara swicha athara kriyakarithwa thaththwayan hi wenasak nomatha.
paribhogika sathkaraya athin lankawa inne boho pahala mattamaka ya.

pu.li.de/wi/ 1,7,8 aakruthi pathraya samaga grama niladhari saha/ho pradeshiya lekam ho balaya pawaru niladhariyaku sahathika karana lada pahatha sandahan lekhana wala chaya pitapath (idiripath karana lada pitapath walin illumkaruge nama saha upan dinaya sanatha wiya yuthuya) danata hawitha karana handunumpatha uppanna sahathikaya ho uppanna lekhanayen uputagath satahana ho anumana wayas sahathikaya samanga upan dinaya sanatha kala haki lekhanayak ( daruwekuge uppannayak / pasal harayame sahathikaya / wathu harayame sahathikaya / thahawuru tharana lada kendarayaka pitapathak / wiwaha sahathikaya / purawasi sahathikaya/ diwurum prakashayak ) purawasi sahathikaya (link karanna) wayasa awurudu 40ta wadi uppanna sahathikaya ho anumana wayas sahathikaya nomathi illumkaruwan thama nama saha upan dinaya sanatha karaganima sandaha pahatha sandahan lekhana athireka disthrik rejistrar wisin nikuthkaranu labana lekhana sewime prathipala satahana nama saha upan dinaya sanatha karaganima sandaha piligathahaki likhitha sakshiyak ( daruwekuge uppannayak / pasal harayame sahathikaya / wathu harayame sahathikaya / thahawuru karana lada kendarayaka pitapathak / wiwaha sahathikaya / purawasi sahathikaya/ wadihiti handunumpatha ) nama, upan dinaya ha upan sthanaya thahawuru kirimata widhimath diwurum prakashayak (aakruthiya link karanna) wruththiya sanatha kirima sandaha idiripath kala yuthu lekhana rajya anshaya - masa 06k athulatha di laba gath sewaya sanatha kirime lipiya paudgalika anshaya - masa 06k athulatha di laba gath sewaya sanatha kirime lipiya waidya, injineru, nithignya, waralath ganakadhikari saha gruha nirmana shilpi thanathuru athulath kirima sandaha upadhi sahathiya menma wruththiya sahathika wishramika thanathura athulath kirima sandaha wishramika lipiya / wishramika kadpatha wyaparikayaku nam wyapara liyapadinchi kirime sahathikaya handunumpatha nikuth kirimedi awashya anekuth lekhana bauddha bhikshun wahanse namak nam bauddha katayuthu departhamenthuwen laba gath samanera sahathikaya ho upasampada sahathikaya anekuth aagamika pujakawarun adala departhamenthu magin pujyathwaya thahawuru kara laba gath sahathika pawidi bhawaya/ pujyathwaya athahara athnam ee bawa thahawuru kara adala departhamenthu magin laba gath sahathika swamipurushayage nama laba ganima sandaha - wiwaha sahathikaya.
